div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 366 Olynthus, Macedonia, 1934 (761) Burial: 379 B.C. (Clement) Contents: 9 AR. Pot hoard, from excavations Chalcidian League: 7 tetrob. Terone: 1 tetrob. Perdiccas II: 1 tetrob. Disposition: Athens Robinson-Clement, Olynthus IX, pp. 177-9, illus. (hd. VII)
